portada.descripcion: Graduated in Computer Systems Analyst and Frontend Developer, I design efficient applications and web pages, with a focus on innovation and adaptability to your requirements to captivate and improve the user experience. I invite you to see some of my projects and to contact me to work together.

proyectos.descrisn: Website created at the client's request for the sale of nutritional products.
proyectos.descriec: E-commerce carried out as a final course project for the sale of clothing and shoes.
